title: B3albakii
author: B3albakii
content: Hello everyone, I want to let you know that I specialize in repairing ASIC miners. Feel free to ask me anything about hardware, or if you're interested in learning how to repair them, I'm ready to help!

comments.author: CanaryWharf
comments.body: Quote from: B3albakii on November 27, 2023, 11:07:22 PMHello everyone, I want to let you know that I specialize in repairing ASIC miners. Feel free to ask me anything about hardware, or if you're interested in learning how to repair them, I'm ready to help!hey, two of the heatsinks fell off one of the hashboards on my s17+, they also ripped off the cpu chip.i got replacement chips and soldering equipment, however i never repaired asic before, so, from zero knowledge, how long do you expect this would take to repair?

comments.author: ZeusBtc.com
comments.body: Quote from: CanaryWharf on December 09, 2023, 06:31:43 AMhey, two of the heatsinks fell off one of the hashboards on my s17+, they also ripped off the cpu chip.i got replacement chips and soldering equipment, however i never repaired asic before, so, from zero knowledge, how long do you expect this would take to repair?Hey, I would like to share with you the ASIC miner repair course launched by ZEUS MINING, referred to as ZMRC. Our courses start from the basics. If you are interested, you can view our course content here.https://course.zeusbtc.com/If you have maintenance experience, you can also discuss some fault phenomena with our technicians, who will provide free support.
